message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can offer you a price of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to meet you at $110. Can you do that?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I can see that you're a serious buyer. I can meet you halfway between $110 and $130, so I'll offer it to you for $120. This is my final offer, as I have another interested buyer who is willing to pay the minimum price of $120.
